entry.title: Healthy Homemade Dark Chocolates
entry.summary: Kids can make these healthy homemade chocolates without sugar or artificial sweeteners. Learn the secret ...

entry.title: Quick And Easy Noddles Recipe
entry.summary: A quick and easy recipe, for slightly soupy vegetable noodles. Flavorful, healthy, non-spicy and rich in anti-oxidants. Perfect for the whole family to enjoy together.

entry.title: Kids Make Tiramisu
entry.summary: An easy to make dessert, with widely available ingredients, that doubles up as an activity for kids.

entry.title: 4 Yummy Creative Sandwich Fillings
entry.summary: True beauty lies within .... a sandwich.

entry.title: Italian Dosa Surprise
entry.summary: A non-spicy kid friendly fusion of Italian and Indian flavors and textures that adults can enjoy just as much.

entry.title: Great Big Balls Of Crunchy Ice
entry.summary: A quick and easy recipe, for golas, with all the taste and none of the germs.

entry.title: Summer Soda Recipes
entry.summary: Sodas make summers fun, frothy and fizzy! Here are some super simple recipes.

entry.title: Easy Dry Fruit Cake Recipe
entry.summary: Easy dry-fruit cake recipe, which can double up as a Christmas cake for the festive season.

entry.title: A Quick And Easy Recipe For Chocolate Ice-cream
entry.summary: A quick and easy recipe, for rich, creamy, chocolate ice cream, that does not require an ice-cream maker.

entry.title: Simple Delightful Snack Made With Apples
entry.summary: An easy breakfast/dessert/snack recipe, made with apples. Warm, buttery and crunchy, it is perfect for chilly or rainy days.

entry.title: Strawberries With Dark Chocolate Pudding
entry.summary: An, easy to make, dessert, with delicous fresh strawberries and the goodness of dark chocolate, for you to enjoy with your little ones. Yum, yum yum ...

entry.title: Vegetable Pulao With A Mediterranean Twist
entry.summary: The best recipes I have come up with, have always been under strange circumstances of necessity. This one is no exception. My daughter has a fixed menu given by the school and on Fridays I have to send her whatever the school has asked me to.

entry.title: Pancake Recipe Optimized For Kids
entry.summary: Bite sized, mess-free, pieces of nutritious, fluffy, chocolaty, goodness that make both mother and daughter happy.

entry.title: Ice, Ice, Baby
entry.summary: On hot summer days when the kids are home every day, moms are on the look out for cooling recipes and engaging kids activities. Here is a way to kill the proverbial two birds with one stone or should I say ice-cube?

entry.title: Walnut Garlic Dip With Carrot Sticks
entry.summary: This is an easy to make, snack. It is flavourful, and can be made spicy or not. The walnuts, whole wheat bread, and carrots make it a nutitious and rich in vitamins.

entry.title: Date Plum Jam Recipe
entry.summary: This jam is easy to make, exotic, and delicious. It tastes particularly good, spread atop a crisp, buttered, toast. It is perfect for kids and their moms. Made with dates, plums, and no sugar at all, it is nutritious and healthy too.
